item.description:
Back by Popular Demand:) Let's have Thanksgiving Dinner at my house again :) Everyone had such a great time. We will ask everyone to bring something to share with others. It will be alot of fun !

If you cant make dinner please join us for desserts later in the day: I will do the basic Turkey, Ham, Stuffing, Potatoes, Squash, just list what you would like to bring and come on over. Please BYOB.

                                          Everyone that has attended knows that this is a unformal and a very relaxed dinner so come join in having dinner with some new and old friends.

Please Do Not Put A MAYBE for Dinner - If you are coming Dinner or just Dessert later please state that. Any questions please feel free to call me. Katie 617-680-5768

Please be considerate that I have to do the food shopping so let's be sure that your coming for Dinner or just dessert.
item.name: Just Us Amigo's Thanksgiving Dinner
